message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for this product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high to me. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would $140 be within your consideration?
Bob, I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't go below $155. This is my final offer.
